review.intent: Analyze within-session temporal effects: warmup improvements, effort distribution over task position, compaction impacts, and session length degradation.
focus: Verify warmup effect claims match the session-analysis.json warmup data
Check that idle-time sensitivity analysis thresholds are correctly rendered and the cost-per-minute narrative accounts for idle filtering
Ensure session length degradation is presented as a shared effect, not attributed to only one model

prose.guidance: This section covers session dynamics. Characterize warm-up effects, effort distribution over task position, and long-session degradation for each model. Note whether session-level effects are shared or model-specific. Idle-time sensitivity analysis should document how different thresholds affect cost-per-minute calculations.
